video_prompt: A hand draws a cat-girl creature onto a sketchpad, adding details to its multicolored fur. The hand moves the green pencil across the page, developing the illustration. A second hand occasionally rests on the sketchpad. Subtle shifts in warm light illuminate the drawing as it progresses.
image_prompt: Top-down view of someone drawing a whimsical "cat-girl" creature in a spiral-bound sketchpad illuminated by warm light on a dark desk. The creature has a calico cat head and tail, a girl's body in a blue jumper, and vibrant, rainbow-colored, feather-like fur. A hand holds a green pencil, actively sketching details into the creature's fur. Faint blue sketch lines are visible. Another hand rests on the open sketchpad, which has "c29" written on it. Emphasizes creativity and artistry.
refined_video_prompt: A hand continuously moves, adding intricate details to a developing illustration. The pencil glides across the surface, progressively building the artwork. A second hand periodically enters the frame, briefly resting before retreating. The scene is dynamically lit by subtle shifts in warm illumination, responding to the evolving drawing.
